body_html: Ok so I just split up the is_variable_or_undefined tag into two separate booleans. This also removes a bunch of hacks where we checked something like is_variable_or_undefined() && defined() to mean is_variable. Is this ok now?
body_text: Ok so I just split up the is_variable_or_undefined tag into two separate booleans. This also removes a bunch of hacks where we checked something like is_variable_or_undefined() && defined() to mean is_variable. Is this ok now?
body: Ok so I just split up the `is_variable_or_undefined` tag into two separate booleans. This also removes a bunch of hacks where we checked something like `is_variable_or_undefined() && defined()` to mean `is_variable`. Is this ok now?
